name: Tho Must Destroy The Never-Ending Problematic Train of Thought
name_original: Tho Must Destroy The Never-Ending Problematic Train of Thought
description:
A CiGA Jam entry made in 48 hours.

While ensuring the one-to-one correspondence of the elements, it constitutes irrelevant meaning-it is a ruthless pair

"I saw an inexplicable man using its tentacles to smash the train into thousands of pieces. The train was so frightened that it even broke off the track while escaping from the inexplicable, and it was forever lost."

But in fact, it is just the self-help of programmers against a frightening jam and the never-ending coding.

[ Controls ]

Hold Right-Click to throw the hook.

Release to initial pulling.

Move the mouse at high speed to pull apart the train.

[ Creators ]

Franco Toledo - Music & Sounds - @shawntrrttll

Sam Feng - Programming - @samfenggames

Eizi Yu - Programming - https://eizimailcom.itch.io/

Additional Designers: CathieQ, Minako Kojima
